message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. Given its value, I'm offering it at $20,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
